channel-message:
**READ THIS BEFORE POSTING**
:tools: Welcome to the Unpaid Request Services channel! 

```
- This is only for requesting services, do not reply to services here.
- If you wish to complete a request. DM Them. Do not reply here.
- Remove completed requests to keep the list "fresh"
- Only have one message in this channel at a time.
- The list is cleared every month.
- Services should not be for plugin help. Please post in #plugin-help
- Bumping requests is not permitted.
- Requests require to have a budget of either none or a range (No DM for budget)
- Stick to the template below:
```

**Template:** (Follow this template or your message will be removed)
```
[Service] Custom Plugin
[Request] I need a plugin that spawns many Llamas over the spawn.
```
